divs: Sighting DetailsMy name is Bud Simko,Diana's brother,as she told me.At 6;00am out of her bedroom window on the 8th floor of her Hi rise apt,at about 45 degrees in the northwest,about 10 circular objects with a short string tailing behind going in and out of a cloud.A storm front was just moving in.They looked like a small search lights.. but no trail to the ground.She looked again at 8:ooam and they were still there but not as many.They all soon vanished and a bright red- orange flash star size appeared for a short time.There are sea gulls in the area and the sighting was in the direction of Detroit Metro Airport,10 miles from her.Diana felt calm and she has an interest in UFOs.
Summary: several,not real bright lights with a short string tail folling in a circular pattern
